thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 23 of 260
thread.title: Ahmed Mufti

author: Ahmed Mufti
title: Ahmed Mufti
text:
Had an issue with 2 orders that were in fact ordered at the same time, however, they were ordered separately for some strange reason one minute apart from one another, in addition to having to pay shipping for both items when they were in one order exceeding the amount of $34.99.
I reached out to customer service immediately and told them about the issue, in which they proceeded to say that it was a glitch, furthermore, the shipping fees were not refunded given the acknowledgment of the glitch
